mapper.select: SELECT free_num, free_subject, free_title, mem_id, free_hit, DATE_FORMAT(free_created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS free_created_date FROM free_board WHERE free_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY free_num DESC

SELECT free_num, free_subject, free_title, mem_id, free_hit, DATE_FORMAT(free_created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS free_created_date FROM free_board WHERE free_deleted = 'N' AND free_subject = #{freeSubject} ORDER BY free_num DESC

SELECT free_num, free_subject, free_title, mem_id, free_hit, DATE_FORMAT(free_created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS free_created_date FROM free_board WHERE
free_deleted = 'N' AND ${searchType} like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') ORDER BY free_num DESC

SELECT free_num, free_subject, free_title, mem_id, free_hit, DATE_FORMAT(free_created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS free_created_date FROM free_board WHERE free_deleted = 'N' AND ${searchType} like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') AND free_subject = #{freeSubject} ORDER BY free_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board ( free_title, free_cont, free_created_date, mem_id, free_subject ) VALUES ( #{freeTitle}, #{freeCont}, NOW(), #{memId}, #{freeSubject} )
mapper.select: SELECT free_num, free_title, free_cont, free_hit, DATE_FORMAT(free_created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS free_created_date, DATE_FORMAT(free_updated_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS free_updated_date, mem_id, free_subject FROM free_board WHERE free_num = #{freeNum} AND free_deleted = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board SET free_hit = free_hit + 1 WHERE free_num = #{freeNum}
UPDATE free_board SET free_title = #{freeTitle}, free_cont = #{freeCont}, free_updated_date = Now(), free_subject = #{freeSubject} WHERE free_num = #{freeNum}
UPDATE free_board SET free_deleted = 'Y', free_updated_date = Now() WHERE free_num = #{freeNum}
